SENT.plain: PBL of 14 patients with FL were examined by membrane fluorescence using anti-Ig antibodies (mu, gamma, delta; kappa, lambda), spontaneous rosette formation with SRBC and rosette formation with SRBC coated by antibody-complement complexes (EAC)
Eight of the patients were untreated
In 3 patients monoclonal Ig were detected in the serum or urine
7 patients exhibited clonal proliferation as judged by analysis of surface Ig
In addition, normal or elevated figures for EAC rosettes were found
Ig in PBL of FL patients is in contrast to the findings in CLL and multiple meloma, the increase of EAC-rosettes is shared by myeloma patients
It follows that membrane properties of PBL as studied in this work is of value in the diagnosis of malignancies of the B-cell system
